[@mix](@ye+QM09iPcDJD6YvQYjoQc7sLF/IFhmNbEqgdzQo3lQ=.ed25519) 

> I guess Iâ€™m experimenting with being more vanilla

Same. I've been trying to explicitly list out any experiments that I'm doing [here](https://github.com/fraction/oasis/blob/master/docs/contributing.md). I've tried Swig, EJS, and finally Hyperaxe (basically hyperscript + hyperscript-helpers, though [you know that](https://twitter.com/whimful/status/964990550922248193)), but I'd also like to stay as close to vanilla JS as possible -- at least the good parts. ðŸ™ƒ

Anyway, big +1 on having a nice diagnostic tool, regardless of the framework / template syntax.
